subject: Baseball
Human Growth Hormone
lead_paragraph: Brian Cashman said that terms of Andy Pettitte’s contract were agreed to 10 days before the contract was announced, up to a week before Pettitte said he learned about the report.
snippet: Brian Cashman said that terms of Andy Pettitte’s contract were agreed to 10 days before the contract was announced, up to a week before Pettitte said he learned about the report.
